name: Sword Slash
description: Passive AoE damage around your melee attacks. Each level increases splash damage and radius.

1.description: Deals 25% weapon damage to enemies within 1.5 tiles

2.description: Deals 35% weapon damage to enemies within 1.8 tiles

3.description: Deals 45% weapon damage to enemies within 2.0 tiles

4.description: Deals 55% weapon damage to enemies within 2.3 tiles

5.description: Deals 70% weapon damage to enemies within 2.5 tiles

6.description: Deals 85% weapon damage to enemies within 2.8 tiles

7.description: Deals 100% weapon damage to enemies within 3.0 tiles
